price: (Addunyaa kana keessatti) gara jecha gaarii qajeelfaman, gara karaa (Rabbii) faarfamaa ta’eetti qajeelfaman.
arabic: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi
